pkgmetadata.longdescription: Climate Data from Wang and Dillon // This is the data companion package to the package tempcycles. This package includes the metadata, linear, and cycling parameters from "Recent geographic convergence in diurnal and annual temperature cycling flattens global thermal profiles", Wang Dillon, Nature Climate Change, 4, 988-992 (2014). doi:10.1038/nclimate2378.
